   2  """ 
   3  The :mod:`parsimony.functions` module contains several functions used 
   4  throughout the package. These represent mathematical functions and should thus 
   5  have properties used by the corresponding algorithms. 
   6   
   7  Loss functions should be stateless. Loss functions may be shared and copied and 
   8  should therefore not hold anything that cannot be recomputed the next time it 
   9  is called.
